diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $14$ units.
The length of the line $BX$ is $x$ units.
Point $X$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line connecting $B$ and $X$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $C$ and $X$.
line_instances: The lines $AB$ and $AC$ form a triangle $ABC$.
The lines $BX$ and $CX$ form a triangle $BCX$.
